#summary How to translate the Application

= Introduction =

Since 0.6.8.2 (r84), the translation is available.


== Default Language Xml (r84)==

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<Language xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" name="English">
  <translate>
    <data name="btnFilterDuplicate_Apply">
    <value>Filter Location Duplicate</value>
  </data>
  <data name="btnFilterDuplicate_None">
    <value>No Duplicate Location</value>
  </data>
  <data name="btnFilterDuplicate_Reset">
    <value>Reset Filter Location Duplicate</value>
  </data>
  <data name="TabCollection">
    <value>My Collection</value>
  </data>
  <data name="TabDataBase">
    <value>DataBase</value>
  </data>
  <data name="TabMissing">
    <value>Missing Roms</value>
  </data>
  </translate>
</Language>
}}}

Change the value, save it under a new xml file.
Name this file with this codes : [http://www.csharp-examples.net/culture-names/ Culture-Names]
For exemple : el.xml for Greek.
